title: enna nAn seiguvEn
sahitya:
enna nAn seiguvEn engE nAn selluvEn Ezhaikku vazhi kATTuvAi dInarakSakA


anupallavi

  kannam kariya kATTil karaDi puli miraTTak-kaNNillA shEi pOlE kalanguginrEn ayyA


caraNam    saNDai sheyyum ulagaik-kaNDu kaNDu veruttEn samsAra bandhattai salittu salittaluttEn
koNDa kaNavanum koDumai shei tOTTinAn kOmaLa giridhara shyAmA parandAmA
